name: Hoi An Street Food and Local Market Experience
description:
Travelling
to Hoi An, taking a walk around the town and get to know Hoi An food by
stopping by at good restaurants, this is the thing that any traveler will and
can do by themselves. To taste true Hoi An food at local places that only Hoi
An people know, you might get questions about how, what and where. For this,
just spending an afternoon joining our tour Hoi An Street Food and Local
Market Experience to satisfy your curiosity. This tour gives you not only
a
choice to taste distinctive street food but also the closest regional life
picture by experiencing the market as well as visiting local activity.
